name: Take It Out!
description:
This game was submitted for the Indie tales Game Jam.

A simple game about taking items out from your room on time in right order.

Music in menu:

Dreamer by Hazy

https://soundcloud.com/hazy_music 

Music provided by www.plugnplaymusic.net

Controls:

  • WASD -  to move.
  • Mouse - look around.
  • E - grab.
